name: Eyekour
description:
Created for the GMTK 2021 GameJam! The game features a fairly simple mechanic of two eyes joined together by a chain. You must control them as you bounce and roll your way to a nice pair of glasses.

I made the game individually, creating all code and assets during the Jam itself.  Unfortunately, this means it is in a very unfinished state, so sorry for the disarray :)
